name: AVContentProposal
desc: An object that describes the content to propose playing after the current item finishes.

items.name: init(contentTimeForTransition: CMTime, title: String, previewImage: UIImage?)
items.desc: Creates a new content proposal with the specified transition time, title, and preview image.

items.name: var contentTimeForTransition: CMTime
items.desc: The time within the timeline of the current player item when the content proposal presentation should begin.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title of the proposed content.

items.name: var previewImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The preview image of the proposed item.

items.name: var metadata: [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: Optional custom metadata associated with the proposed item.

items.name: var automaticAcceptanceInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: The interval between the time playback ends and automatic acceptance of this content proposal.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL of the proposed content.
